ygData.subject: Re: OT - Re: [eq_wizards] Mana Management, and other topics
ygData.msgSnippet: Guys in almost every browse now there are filter....Even Netscape has filters, just set up a simple filter to move all messages with eq_wizards@onelist.com in
ygData.messageBody:
Guys in almost every browse now there are filter....Even Netscape has
filters, just set up a simple filter to move all messages with
eq_wizards@onelist.com in the sender field to a folder you create named EQ.
Not exactly rocket science.


dayne@... wrote:

> From: dayne@...
>
> On Wed, 21 Apr 1999 00:40:35 -0400, you wrote:
>
> >From: Vince Seese <seese@...>

> <snip>

> >can make this more manageable?
> >Micon / Karana
>
> I have no problem managing the several lists I'm on, the SoCal Rave
> list used to generate hundreds a day, every day.
>
> I use Forte Inc.'s Agent as my mail and newsgroup reader and I don't
> think it can be rivaled. The filtering is as complex as you want to
> get and easy as you need it to be if you're new to filtering.
>
> Just MHO.
